EmailTemplate.description: Respond to Honeywell employees asking for access
EmailTemplate.name: Pubs HON Employee
EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Publication Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting BendixKing Technical Publications.
Honeywell employees have technical publications access by default. Please go to the Technical Publications section of myaerospace.com to obtain this manual.
https://myaerospace2.honeywell.com/wps/myportal/tech-pubs
Thank you,
BendixKing Technical Publications Team pubs@bendixking.com Access our Publications online at myaerospace.com
